summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements: REQ-35 (Stripe Connect button for owner), REQ-36 (light blue menu background), and REQ-37 (automatic owner badge for CelestiNix). The backend implements owner badge logic checking against the 'CelestiNix' username, the frontend adds a Stripe Connect button visible only to owners, and the menu background has been changed to light blue throughout the application.

hallucinated_features.description: Stripe Connect callback handling window and popup management
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes popup window management and references a '/stripe-callback' redirect URI, but the BuildRequest only requested initiating the OAuth flow, not handling the callback or popup management

The code includes a hardcoded placeholder client ID string. While this is implementation detail that was not explicitly forbidden, it goes beyond the requirement to 'initiate Stripe Connect OAuth flow' by adding specific configuration placeholders
